channel.title: Need help with hosting a website!
channel.description:
Ok well for the time being I'm just gonna use Freehostia. I have all my files uploaded to the file manager or whatever, I used SmartFTP.
Now when I type in the URL of my site it just takes me to some page that says "Index of/" then lists all my files.
How do I make an index page so that when someone goes to "www.mysite.com" it will take them to my homepage that I have made.
Thanks for any help. (prolly gonna get laughed at for this question lol, but this is my first time hosting a site.)
EDIT: Alright I got the index thing fixed. The website URL is [url=http://favoritememoriesphotography.freehostia.com/]HERE[/url]. Keep in mind that I haven't made a banner yet.

item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

[quote=“Starting up …, post:17, topic:295622”]Honestly I’m not to fond of your Navigation bar and Header. I’ll PM you a simple design tomorrow that you might like ;).[/quote]Yeah I didn’t really know what to do with navigation so I just made that menu with the drop down options. And the header is one of the things that I haven’t worked on.

[/quote]Will I get a subdomain?
[/quote]Hmm alright, whats some specs?

It would be good if you provided your own, but I could provide YOURSITE.phlorum.net
[/quote][/quote]With a site like that I doubt you would need much. Maybe the most for the picture.

item.title: Need help with hosting a website!
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

[quote=“Starting up …, post:11, topic:295622”]I meant for the contact us page ;). It’s not a bad looking site at all… Contact me on my msn or aim if you need anymore help :).[/quote]Well thank you, I don’t have time tonight I gotta study for 2 tests but I’ll add you sometime. And do I not already have a captcha on my contact form?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with hosting a website!

item.title: Need help with hosting a website!
item.dc:creator: @Starting_up Starting up ...
item.description:
@Starting_up wrote:

[quote=“mjordan, post:10, topic:295622”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=391622.msg2916594#msg2916594 date=1250487582]
Ill give you free hosting, which is 100X better than freehostia if you want.
[/quote]Will I get a subdomain?

[quote author=Starting up … link=topic=391622.msg2916904#msg2916904 date=1250522007]
Google is a great tool for finding out about captcha and wordpress

Looking at the site, it looks like its only going to be for a really small site, or at least for working on it. Which if your only going to use it to develop the site I would suggest a local apache server such as Xampp.
[/quote]Well I know what a captcha is, I’m just wondering what you say I should use it for? I thought about a wordpress blog but could not find a good one, and I’m making this site for one of my teachers for free and I’ve already worked on it way more than I intended so I’m just sticking with what I have cause I’m pretty much almost done and she will think the site is wonderful lol. So yeah I just have it on freehostia for testing right now.

Thanks for all the help so far guys.[/quote]I meant for the contact us page ;). It’s not a bad looking site at all… Contact me on my msn or aim if you need anymore help :).

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with hosting a website!

[quote=“Starting up …, post:9, topic:295622”]Google is a great tool for finding out about captcha and wordpress

Looking at the site, it looks like its only going to be for a really small site, or at least for working on it. Which if your only going to use it to develop the site I would suggest a local apache server such as Xampp.[/quote]Well I know what a captcha is, I’m just wondering what you say I should use it for? I thought about a wordpress blog but could not find a good one, and I’m making this site for one of my teachers for free and I’ve already worked on it way more than I intended so I’m just sticking with what I have cause I’m pretty much almost done and she will think the site is wonderful lol. So yeah I just have it on freehostia for testing right now.

Thanks for all the help so far guys.

Read full topic

@Starting_up wrote:

[quote=“mjordan, post:7, topic:295622”][quote author=Starting up … link=topic=391622.msg2916393#msg2916393 date=1250470489]
index.html not Index.html… also, I would suggest captcha instead

and a wordpress blog over some cheesy blogspot blog ;). If you need any help you can contact me via MSN or AIM.
[/quote]Wow you are a genius lol. And what do you mean captcha and a wordpress blog?[/quote]Google is a great tool for finding out about captcha and wordpress

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:8, topic:295622”]Ill give you free hosting, which is 100X better than freehostia if you want.[/quote]Looking at the site, it looks like its only going to be for a really small site, or at least for working on it. Which if your only going to use it to develop the site I would suggest a local apache server such as Xampp.

such as

index.html
index.php
index.aspx
index.jsp

etc…
